channel.title: Recent Password Reset Forced
channel.description:
So here is what my problem is. I got another account. Well I do now... since I can't use my other one. Why can't I use it? it's quite simple I went on it with my iphone, and it used this mobile format. Now for some odd reason every time I try to get onto it on my laptop it still gives it in that mobile format like my phone.
So what is the problem? I don't get the screen where it asks to change password just gets stuck.
I know someone is going say "so what use your phone to reset it." Don't insult me.... I already tried that.
Thank you, for any other ideas.

item.title: Recent Password Reset Forced
item.dc:creator: @moparRuler moparRuler
item.description:
@moparRuler wrote:

Thank you very much. Worked perfectly.

Read full topic

item.title: Recent Password Reset Forced
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Put ‘;theme=3’ at the end of the URL in your browser and try it.

Read full topic

item.title: Recent Password Reset Forced
item.dc:creator: @EvilscapeV3 EvilscapeV3
item.description:

Thank you, for any other ideas.
